conbody.p: Lock input mode allows the teacher to block keyboard and mouse input for individual student workstations, group, or the whole class.
Select Lock input from the student menu (see ) to lock input for selected student.
Press Remote control in the group tab menu (see ) and select Lock input to lock input for workstations in the group.
Press Remote control button in the class tab menu (see ) and select Lock input to lock input for all workstations in the class.
Repeat actions described above to release the lock.
